channel.title: Michael Gutierrez on The California Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Gutierrez on The California Tech

item.title: Spotlight: Sean Cutting, Accessibility Services Specialist
item.description: According to a recent estimate, more than 250 students at Caltech receive some form of disability accommodation – academic, housing, dietary, or otherwise.

item.title: Fizz Asserts Control
item.description: Since the very first day I stepped foot on campus for winter term, I knew Fizz was going to be nothing but trouble. No worthwhile product has ever been advertised with colorful cardstock flyers delivered to doorsteps.

item.title: The CRC is Back
item.description: It’s no exaggeration to say life as we know it would not be possible without the Honor Code. We often take this implicit trust between students, faculty, and staff, for granted. But as in any relationship, this trust can start to degrade over time if it is not reassessed and reaffirmed.
